name: Inverted-Quality
author: thesixthroc
title: Inverted Quality
description:
Inverts the quality system into negative tiers. Crafting items has a 60% chance to reduce their quality by one tier. 

To cope with the new gameplay, three additional entities are provided: the Downgrade Port allows high-quality items to be used in low-quality recipes; the Meltdown Facility allows the melting down of low-quality items back into Normal base materials; and the Burner Assembling Machine avoids a softlock in the early-game.
